Articles.Content:
Well, I am sure some of you have wanted a mobile artillery unit. Now, there is one!

Unfortunately, right now it\'s based out of the Hangar. I will be fixing that soon, though...

For now, enjoy!

(sorry, no screencaps right now, the game is at night...)

Hints: Before opening fire, set the parking brakes, and do NOT drive off the runway after completing a fire mission. you\'ll flip and be unable to right yourself.

To quote the rest of the internet:

Pics, or it didn\'t happen.

Deal!

New version of the cart using training rounds and launching from the launchpad is attached. same addons required.
